m_szDocTitle: 2016 Detroit Auto Show Catches Eye with Attractive Launches - NASDAQ.com
m_szDocSumamry: 2016 Detroit Auto Show Catches Eye with Attractive Launches January 12, 2016, 05:10:00 PM EDT By Zacks Equity Research, Zacks.com Shutterstock photo The 2016 North American International Auto Show is expected to witness more than 40 vehicle launches. The latest edition of the popular annual auto show, also known as the Detroit Auto Show, opened on Jan 11, 2016, with the announcement of Honda Motor Co., Ltd.'s HMC Civic as the car of the year and Volvo's XC90 SUV as the truck of the year. Then, the stream of spectacular vehicle displays followed: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. FCAU showcased th
